snippet: Manchester United surged closer to a 20th English league title, opening up an 8-point lead by beating Queens Park Rangers, 2-0, while the floundering second-place team, Manchester City, lost at Arsenal, 1-0.
abstract: Manchester United surges closer to a 20th English league title, opening up an 8-point lead by beating Queens Park Rangers, 2-0; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Manchester United surged closer to a 20th English league title, opening up an 8-point lead by beating Queens Park Rangers, 2-0, while the floundering second-place team, Manchester City, lost at Arsenal, 1-0.

headline.seo: Manchester United Moves Closer to Championship
headline.main: Manchester United Moves Closer to Championship
headline.print_headline: Manchester United Moves Closer to Championship
